tool_description:
API that provides access to a collection of thousands of riddles (and growing). Fetch a random riddle or a riddle of the day. You can build a perfect app to entertain kids and families for dinner times. You can also pull riddles by their ID, difficulty level and keyword of your interest. API also collects feedback such as upvotes, and flags to fine-tune the library of riddles. I will constantly be adding more riddles to the API as I come across them. 
The Basic plan is completely FREE with a ...
name: Riddlie
title: Riddlie

api_list.name: Flag Riddle
api_list.description:
With this endpoint, you can flag a riddle. This helps the API developer to finetune the API for better service in the future.  You can only use four flags sending the number corresponding to the flag type as below:

0: for flagging the riddle as "Duplicate"
1: for flagging the riddle as "Inappropriate"
2: for flagging the riddle as "Not a Riddle"
3: for flagging the riddle as "Missing Information"

api_list.name: Update Level
api_list.description:
This endpoint enables you to update the level of the Riddle. All the riddles are set to a medium level which is enumerated as "1".  You can suggest the level of a riddle by simply calling this endpoint with query parameters "0", "1", or "2". 
"0" is Easy
"1" is Medium 
"2" is Hard

api_list.name: Riddle by Keyword
api_list.description: Get one random riddle around a specific subject or keyword. For example, a riddle on a "cat".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://riddlie.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/riddles/bykeyword/cat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "riddlie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://riddlie.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/riddles/bykeyword/{keyword}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "riddlie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Upvote Riddle
api_list.description: Simply calling this endpoint registers a "like" to better serve the riddles in the future. There is no response back other than a status message.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://riddlie.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/riddles/upvote/63bdef027183b71946b64ee6"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "riddlie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Riddle of the Day
api_list.description: With this endpoint, you can request a riddle of the day. Each day API will serve a different riddle with an answer and other details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://riddlie.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/riddles/rod"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "riddlie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Random Riddle
api_list.description: This endpoint responds with a new random riddle with an answer and other details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://riddlie.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/riddles/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "riddlie.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
